title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Online Instruction of Threshold Concepts in Information Literacy for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can select credible information sources using at least three evaluation criteria for given research topics
Learners can establish information search strategies using online learning objects and apply them to actual projects
Learners can perform ethical information use and citation methods in team-based projects with 90% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
